name: Donut Tactics
description:
Hey there. If you have click this game you are in for a treat....So this is a version 0.01 of an idea I started out in CPP and it turn into this unity thing and into jazz? I did not have a clear idea for this game so I am putting it in the back burner for now. 

Is there glitches?                                                                                                                                                          Yes there is alot...Like I said this game didn't have a clear Idea and or to many. Like all my game project before it I over scoop.  Is it is stuck in this version with alot of the meat I kind of just commit it out. For now yes I will come back to it's later down the line.

But if you want to see and follow what I am put to next leave a follow at these.

https://twitter.com/AzureBoers

https://www.twitch.tv/azureboers
